synopsis.text: Hanayama Baki, a formidable martial artist, continues his relentless pursuit to surpass his father, Yujiro, who is renowned as the world's strongest fighter. Just as Baki emerges triumphant from a vicious underground tournament, he finds himself facing an unexpected challenge. Five of the world's deadliest death row inmates, all martial arts experts, have escaped their confinements and set their sights on Tokyo. Tired of their invincibility and the monotony it brings, these ruthless convicts seek the thrill of defeat and believe Baki is the only one capable of delivering it. As Baki prepares for this impending battle, he finds unexpected allies in fellow underground martial artists Kaoru Hanayama, Gouki Shibukawa, Retsu Kaiou, and Doppo Orochi. Brace yourself for an epic showdown between Baki and his allies against the world's most violent and brutal death row inmates in this thrilling anime adaptation of Keisuke Itagaki's manga.
